Legal_Issue: Whether the applicant's motion for an extension of time to file for judicial review can be granted under s. 82.1(5) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 82.1(5)
Procedural_Stage: Motion for extension of time; Application for leave and judicial review
Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient evidence provided by the applicant; reliance on solicitor's affidavit instead of personal testimony
Burden_of_Proof: On the applicant to demonstrate special reasons and a good case on the merits
Credibility_Factor: Lack of personal affidavit undermines credibility
Legal_Rule: Section 82.1(5) allows for extension of time to apply for judicial review only for 'special reasons' and requires a strong case on the merits and compliance with procedural rules
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness or correctness depending on issue; procedural fairness may be reviewed on reasonableness standard
Procedural_Issue: Failure to comply with procedural requirements, including lack of personal affidavit and insufficient detail in application
Outcome_on_Merits: Not reached due to procedural deficiencies
Review_Standard: Special reasons required under s. 82.1(5); procedural compliance assessed objectively
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Procedural fairness not met due to inadequate submissions
Key_Evidence_Considered: Applicant's failure to provide details about conviction or Ministerâ€™s decision
Legal_Framework: Administrative law; Judicial review framework under IRPA
Applicant_Challenge: Seeking extension of time beyond 15-day limit to file for judicial review
Court_Result: Motion dismissed; originating application for leave and judicial review denied
Legal_Rule_Source: Statutory: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 82.1(5)
Remedy_Requested: Extension of time to file for judicial review
Legal_Provision: s. 82.1(5), Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Outcome_of_Review: Application dismissed due to procedural non-compliance and lack of evidence
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Extension of time to file for judicial review
